# üåª Noble SSRT <img src="https://i.imgur.com/M8UicM6.png" data-canonical-src="https://i.imgur.com/M8UicM6.png" width="40" height="40" />
Noble SSRT is a shaderpack that features Screen Space Ray Tracing which helps rendering things such as reflections more accurately.
Its goal is to enhance one's experience on Minecraft with the help of good-looking graphics and plenty of customizable options.
It is my very first GLSL project thus some things may or may not be as expected. I am learning from this experience as a beginner.

## üå∫ Install
### Releases
I haven't planned any complete release date yet. As said above, this is an experimental project 
and I am still learning as an apprentice shader developer. However, you can download the latest
dev versions on the project's Discord server. The invite link is down below.

### Tutorial
   1. Join the Discord server. ([Click me!](https://discord.gg/jjRrhpkH9e))
   2. Read the *#releases* channel.
   3. Download the desired release.
   4. Extract it from the .zip file.
   5. Put it in your "shaderpacks" folder.
      * Hold Windows + R.
      * Type %appdata% in the window.
      * Drag the shaderpack and drop it in */.minecraft/shaderpacks/*
   6. Enjoy!

Do not hesitate to contact me if you encounter any major issue.
